title: March 2020 Meetup Tour Links
description:
The tour is upon us. Please sign up on Meetup so the hosts can have some idea how many people will attend. 

March 2  Tucson AZ:  https://www.meetup.com/Tucson-ConverZations/events/268937092/ 
March 4  Bellflower CA:   https://www.meetup.com/Jordan-Peterson-Appreciation-Society/events/268965849/
March 5  Chino CA:https://www.meetup.com/Jordan-Peterson-Inland-Empire-Meetup/events/268564977/
March 14 Fresno CA: https://www.meetup.com/Fresno-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/events/267837868/   
March 15 Sacramento CA: https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/events/267806924/
March 16 Salem OR: https://www.meetup.com/Salem-Jordan-B-Peterson-Meetup-Group/events/269089771/
March 17 Seattle WA https://www.meetup.com/Icon-Church-Cultural-Meetups/events/269046699/
March 18 Vancouver Burnaby BC: https://www.meetup.com/Burnaby-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/events/268839207/ 
March 19 Portland OR: CANCELLED: the  Evening with PVK, Peter Boghossian and Benjamin Boyce. Due to the COVID19 virus. We might do a small meetup instead with just PVK. Keep an eye on the meetup link for details.  https://www.meetup.com/Salem-Jordan-B-Peterson-Meetup-Group/events/269089771/
March 21 Alameda (SF Bay) CA:  https://www.meetup.com/Alameda-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/events/268833352/
